mahanuwara disthrik baladaksha komasaris sarath mathara aarachchi mahathage saha mallika mathara aarachchi mahathmiyage puthraya da wana chathura deshapriya, 1991 wasare ape්ral masa 25 dina upan chathura 1996 wasare di dharmarajayata athul wi 1998 wasaredi pothaka baladakshayeku lesata baladaksha samuhaye samajikathwaya laba 2000 wasaredi pothakayekuta labiya haki ihalama padakkama wana ‘rantharuwa‘ labimen anathuruwa dharmarajaye wishishtathama kanishta baladakshaya sammanayada dina gaththe ya. 2004 wasare di wishishtathama pothaka baladakshaya sammanaya da dinagath chathura kandayam nayakayeku lesata da sewaya karana ladi.

inpasu 2010 juni masayedi mewani jangama durakathana widiyo pata rashiyak athulath kota chanal fo nalikawa siya wartha wadasatahana nishpadanaya kaleya.mema widiyo pata ha chayarupa yuddhaya pilibadawa mawa thibu ramaniya chithraya thu thu kara damimehila samarthaya.niruwath gahanu mala siruru samaga kunuharupa kiyamin ka gasamin winoda wana samanya pirimiyekuge darshanaya samaga wirodara manushika ranawiruwa pilibadawa mawa thibunu chithraya ananya kirima etharam pahasu nowe.rajaya wisinma pathkala ugath padam ha prathisandhana komisama adala widiyo pata pilibada parikshanayak pawathwiya yuthu bawata nirdesha kota thibe.yuddhaya yanu dakune madhyama panthikaya parikalpanaya karagena siti aakaraye wirodara,ramaniya manushika meheyumak nowa prachandathwayen,manawa himikam kelesimwalin ha pilikul sahagatha hasirim walin kiliti wi giya gorathara kriyadamayak bawa me wanawita sagawiya nohaki lesa helidarawu wemin pawathi.
